item.title: E-Commerce Brand Editor & Photoshop Expert Needed - Upwork
item.description:
Video and Photo Editor Needed!

We are looking for a talented, passionate and creative Video and Photo Editor to join our team. As an Editor, you will play a crucial role in editing our user-generated content (UGC) videos and developing new advertisements that resonate with our target audience. Your main job will be stitching together raw video clips and adding engaging overlays, motion graphics, and captions. We are looking for someone who can be their own boss and fix their own problems. Someone who is proactive, can come up with ideas, and has a genuine passion for video editing and self-improvement.

We offer flexible working hours, hourly pay, and commission based pay/bonuses.

Responsibilities:

- Edit and enhance videos to create engaging and compelling visual content
- Piece together raw clips while adding fancy transitions, overlays and edits
- Create engaging video captions with relevant emojis
- Create overlays and motion graphics in the videos
- Photoshop any photos necessary
- Create Instagram posts
- Use Canva to create static ads
- Photoshop product photos and website photos

Requirements:

- Mid to High level understanding of video & photo editing
- Good understanding of English
- Proven experience as a Video and Photo Editor or similar role, with a strong portfolio demonstrating editing skills
- Proficiency in editing softwares such as Premiere Pro, After Effects, Photoshop, etc.
- Attention to detail and a passion for storytelling through visual content
- Genuine interest in video & photo editing
- Curious and eager to learn and grow

Preferred Qualifications:

- Experience in editing UGC videos and creating advertisements for digital platforms
- Familiarity with e-commerce or digital marketing environments
- Experience photoshopping product photos
- Same or similar level editing skills with both video and photo editing.

Benefits:

Flexible working hours and remote work
Multiple high-level learning opportunities working with our brand
Opportunity to contribute to a dynamic and growing e-commerce brand

How to Apply:
Interested candidates should submit a resume and portfolio showcasing their editing skills. Please explain your interest in this position and how your experience aligns with the responsibilities and requirements outlined.

Just to make sure you read this entire application. I will ask you for "the code" at the start of the interview. Your response should be "ecom."

Hourly Range: $6.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 14:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Image Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Image Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Creating marketing material for our brand - Upwork
item.description:
we want to create static banner and video for our brand/campaign.
You will decide the wording, the campaign theme, copywriting etc, also you will create the static banner design and video.

We need 2 campaign theme, each have 5 sizes static banner and 3-sizes video.

The raw file must be provided, so we can edit the wording for other language, if needed.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 30, 2024 14:03 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Finance & Accounting, Graphic Design, Video Advertising, Marketing, Branding, Digital Marketing Materials, Brand Guidelines, Brand Positioning
Skills: Finance & Accounting, Graphic Design, Video Advertising, Marketing, Branding, Digital Marketing Materials, Brand Guidelines, Brand Positioning
Country: Indonesia
click to apply

item.title: Entry level - UGC Creator - Upwork
item.description:
I’m looking for a candidate (based in south America) who has the ability to become a creative UGC creator and help us with content creation for our new jewellery brand which has a collection of unique pieces that are inspired by nature.

The selected candidate will be responsible for taking high-quality photos of our jewellery and creating engaging TikTok videos that highlight our products.

Responsibilities

1. TikTok Video Creation  (Essential)

Objective: Create engaging and creative TikTok videos featuring our jewellery.

Requirements:
Record and edit TikTok videos that highlight the features and beauty of our jewellery.
Use trending sounds, effects, and transitions to enhance video appeal.
Deliver final videos ready for upload to our TikTok account.

2. Photography (desirable)
Objective: Capture high-quality images of our jewellery.

Requirements:
Take clear, well-lit, and aesthetically pleasing photos.
Showcase the jewellery in various settings (e.g. lifestyle shots, etc.).
Provide a variety of angles and close-up shots to highlight details.
Edit photos to enhance quality while maintaining true colours and details of the jewellery.

Qualifications
Recent Graduate (desirable)
Proven experience in product photography, especially jewellery. (desirable)
Proficient in photo and video editing software.(desirable)
Strong understanding of TikTok trends and video production.
Creative mindset with attention to detail.
Excellent communication skills and ability to work with feedback.




Posted On: June 30, 2024 13:22 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Content Creation
Skills: Content Creation
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Seeking Talented After Effects Specialist for Tech-Based Ad Production - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are looking for a skilled video producer to create a dynamic 15-30 second explainer video for our innovative AI chatbot tailored for the construction industry. The ad will showcase the product's capabilities in providing expert suggestions through a visually engaging digital interaction.

Length: 15-30 seconds
Style: Digital, high-tech, and professional
Output Format: Full HD (1920x1080)
Scenes to be produced include:

Responsibilities

Create and animate all visual elements as described. Ensure smooth transitions between scenes.
Integrate text overlays and implement a voiceover synchronized with on-screen action.
Work collaboratively with our team to refine visuals and animations to fit brand guidelines.


Hourly Range: $25.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 13:16 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Video Commercial, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Illustrator, 2D Animation, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Commercial, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Illustrator, 2D Animation, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Canada
click to apply
